Recent updates in New York City include a tragic fire in the Bronx displacing families and injuring firefighters, the death of an FDNY firefighter in Brooklyn, and ongoing issues with heat and gas outages for NYCHA tenants, alongside significant developments in housing and public safety initiatives.

### Risks & Alerts
